definitions: lit. you plant a garden and the flowers do not bloom, you poke a stick in the mud and it grows into a tree
well-laid plans may fail, and success may come where you least expect it
pinyin: you3 yi4 zai1 hua1 hua1 bu4 fa1 , wu2 xin1 cha1 liu3 liu3 cheng2 yin1
simplified: 有意栽花花不发，无心插柳柳成阴
traditional: 有意栽花花不發，無心插柳柳成陰
